name: humming bird eco bamboo fleece and cotton pram blanket
description:
Light yet warm and cosy - one side of this beautiful blanket is made from super soft and cuddly bamboo fleece, the other is a gorgeous bright green cotton scattered with hummingbirds and tropical fruit!

Bamboo is a very soft, natural and ecological material, perfect to keep babies cosy.

Makes a great gift - let us know if you would like us to wrap it.

This blanket measures approximately 24" by 34" and can be machined washed on 30 degrees.

Â£29.00

name: 'Fern' hemp canvas and cotton oversized bag
description:
A large, versatile bag for just about everything! 

Perfect for the beach or pool or carrying all yoga gear. You can fit the whole families towels and toys in this bag. 

Constructed in heavy weight burnt orange hemp canvas and colourful, complimenting 'african wax' cotton detail on the side panels (with a secret pocket inside save you fishing around for your purse!). 

Bag can be rolled up and stored away when not in use and washed on a cool wash with mild detergent.

This bag was handmade for your by Robina Nalumansi who you can see in the second photo.

Size approx, 15x20x5"

name: 'Sprig' Christmas stocking
description:
A very festive Christmas stocking, ready to filled with pressies & treats!

Our stocking are made from our favorite fabrics chosen to bring some east African colour to your Christmas. 

100% cotton with strong ribbon hook to hang from your chimney with pride!

Approx. 11" long by 9" heel to toe.

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge who you can see in the second photo and remember, the profit from every time we sell will help to change the life of a child in the slums of Kampala.

Merry Christmas.

name: 'shooting stars' Christmas stocking
description:
A very festive Christmas stocking, ready to filled with pressies & treats!

Our Christmas stocking are made from our favorite fabrics chosen to bring some8 east African colour to your Christmas. 

100% cotton with strong ribbon hook to hang 'by your chimney with care'!

Approx. 11" long by 9" heel to toe.

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge who you can see in the second photo and remember, the profit from every time we sell will help to change the life of a child in the slums of Kampala.

Merry Christmas!

name: Mini carnival bunting
description:
This cute mini bunting would make a welcome addition to any bedroom, garden party or home. We're using it to decorate our tree this year.

Each flag is approx. 9cm long and each string is approx. 3 meters long.

Made from upcycled bright colourful cotton and navy ribbon.

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge who you can see in the second photo.

name: 'Nile' 100% cotton skirt for women
description:
This women's skirt is 100% cotton with a 2.5' elasticated waist and can be worn at the waist or sitting just above the hips (elastic fully enclosed so not touching skin).

Length approx. 17"

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge (who you can see with her son Jackson in the second photo)

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

name: 'Block' boys 100% cotton shirt
description:
Made from 100% cotton in a fabulously colourful print. The shirt is made in a loose fitting style for comfort of little wrigglers!

Chest sizes:

6-12 months = 23"
1+ years = 25"
2+ years =27"

Machine wash at 30 degrees with a mild detergent to protect our environment (can be washed on higher!)

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge who you can see in the 2nd photo.

name: 'Drum' cotton shirt for boys
description:
Made from 100% cotton in a fabulously colourful print. The shirt is made in a loose fitting style for comfort of little wrigglers!

6-12 months = 23"
1+ years = 25"
2+ years =27"

Machine wash at 30 degrees with a mild detergent to protect our environment (can be washed on higher!)

name: 'Star' cotton trousers for babies
description:
Simple 100% cotton trousers with an elastic waist band - they're easy to pull on and off over nappies. 

All elastic is enclosed and fastened with the cotton so never never touches babies skin. 

Suitable for boys or girls.

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

name: 'Dice' cotton trousers for babies
description:
We're not down with pastels - bring us the colour! 

Simple 100% cotton trousers with an elastic waist band - they're easy to pull on and off over nappies. 

All elastic is enclosed and fastened with the cotton so never never touches babies skin. 

Suitable for boys or girls.

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

name: 'Lemon tree' cotton trousers and t-shirt set for babies
description:
This lemon yellow and deep navy tree pattern looks great on boys or girls. 

The trousers are 100% cotton with an elastic waist band - they're easy to pull on and off over nappies. All elastic is enclosed and fastened with the cotton so it never touches babies skin. 

The t-shirt is super soft organic African cotton with a patch pocket of matching fabric. It fastens with poppers at neck for ease of dressing little wrigglers. 

These items can be brought separately or together (see options).

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

options.name: 3-6 month with matching organic, fairtrade t-shirt
9-12 month with matching orgaic cotton cotton t-shirt

name: 'Autumn' shoulder tie knot tunic top
description:
Made with love from highest quality cotton fabric in an autumn amber orange and black tree pattern and lined with a contracting black cotton. 

There is plenty of room for long or short sleeve tee underneath, without becoming bulky or uncomfortable for your little one. 

You can wear this as a short dress or as a tunic top with leggings.

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

name: 'Hen' shoulder tie knot tunic top
description:
Made with love from highest quality cotton fabric in one of our favorite patterns and lined with a contracting deep, russet red cotton. 

There is plenty of room for long or short sleeve tee underneath, without becoming bulky or uncomfortable for your little one. 

You can wear this as a short dress or as a tunic top with leggings.

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

name: 'Amber' 100% cotton reversible wrap dress
description:
A practical and cute reversible wrap dress in a rich autumnal amber and cute bird pattern. Complimenting soft black cotton on the reverse. Ties with bows at sides.

100% Cotton.

40 degree wash with mild detergent to protect our environment.

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge who you can see in the last photograph.

name: 'Source' reversible wrap dress
description:
A simple reversible wrap dress in the most awesome of prints!

Bright blue and red cotton Vlisco hollandais wax fabric with bright blue complimenting soft light linen on the reverse. Ties with bows at sides.

100% Cotton.

40 degree wash with mild detergent to protect our environment.

name: 'Fern' girls skirt
description:
A super cute skirt in autumnal colours.

The skirt is made from Vlisco hollandais wax fabric is which is 100%  cotton and has an elasticated waistband that give lots of growing room.

Handmade for you by Sarah (who you can see with her son Jackson in the second photo)

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

name: Seashells skirt
description:
This super cute seashell skirt has a deep navy background contrasts with the waves of yellow and green shells. The skirt is 100% cotton with an elasticated waistband that give lots of growing room.

Available in 3-4 years only.

Handmade for you by Sarah (who you can see with her son Jackson in the second photo)

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

It's made from 100% cotton with an elasticated waistband that give lots of growing room.

Available in 2-3 and 4-5 years (see options for measurements details)

Can be washed at 40 degree with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

description:

The elastic is fully enclosed at the legs and waist so it never touches baby's skin.

Available in sizes: 

3-6, 6-12, 12-24 months 

Â£8.50

description:

The elastic is fully enclosed at the legs and waist so it never touches baby's skin.

3-6, 6-12, 12-24 months

name: 'Metric' cotton and hemp jersey scarf
description:
A medium weight - perfect for Autumn. 

100% cotton colourful 'hollandais wax' fabric on one sided and a more snuggly side made from 55% hemp/45% organic cotton jersey in charcoal grey. 

Approx. 142cm x 29cm

name: 'Dice' cotton and hemp scarf
description:
This scarf is medium weight - perfect for Spring! 

It's double sided with bright orange and blue 100% cotton 'hollandais' fabric on one sided and a tamer, softer, more snuggly side made from 55% hemp/45% organic cotton jersey in charcoal grey. 

Adds a dash of colour to any outfit!

Size 142cm x 29cm 

Â£15

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

name: 'Arrow' cotton and hemp scarf
description:
This scarf is medium weight which is perfect for Spring! 

It's double sided with rich maroon, cream and blue 100% cotton 'hollandais' fabric on one sided and a soft snuggly side made from 55% hemp/45% organic cotton jersey in charcoal grey. 

Adds a dash of colour to any outfit!

Size 142cm x 29cm 

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect bright colours and our environment.

name: 'Source' cotton and hemp cushion cover
description:
We love this fresh colour combo...we've called it 'Source' as it reminds us of the Nile in Uganda :) 

Beautiful blue, green and yellow flowing pattern 100% cotton on front with a hemp linen in complimentary cream on reverse. 

30 degree wash with mild detergent to protect our environment.

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge who you can see in the last photo with her son Jackson.

name: 'Bougies' cotton and hemp cushion cover
description:
We love having wax print in our home - we love the colours, patterns and history of it. 

This pattern was first conceived in 1940 by Portuguese trader named Nogueira in the Netherlands and was then shipped to Congo to be sold after the war. 

These colourful cushion covers are 100% cotton on the front with a complimenting electric blue on the reverse with zip fastening.

Approx. 45x45cm

Patterns vary slightly due to scale of the fabric design (as shown in photos).

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge who you can see in the second photo.

name: 'Fan' cushion cover
description:
I just love this graphic print - the fan is supposed to represent a status symbol!

Red, yellow and black fans with plain black on reverse. 

100% cotton. Approx. 

50x50cm

name: Chicken cushion covers
description:
As featured in the Telegraph gift guide and finally back in stock...

We're suckers for a colourful bird print and we are totally in love with this new colourway in bright blue with deep red chickens.

100% cotton patterned fabric on front with bright blue organic hemp canvas on the back (you can bee see back in the extra photos) with zip fastening. 

Patterns vary slightly due to variation in the fabric (as shown in photos) but each cushions features at least one full hen and her family. 

Size is 50x50cm Â£19.50

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge (who you can see in the second photo with her son Jackson).

Cushion not included. 

A purchase from awamu will help to transform the lives of children like Tom in Kampala. Tom was ecstatic when he found out his dream of enrolling in school would finally come true.

Here is a little film we made with Tom and his Aunty so they can tell you for themselves how awamu is changing their lives. 

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/sBZ1xce0UFM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

It's only a few minutes long - we hope you like it.

name: Nest cushion cover
description:
We love our colourful birds prints and this is a making us feel especially springy! 

100% cotton 'super wax' bird nest print on front with bright, vivid blue organic soft hemp canvas on the back (you can bee see back in the extra photos) with zip fastening. 

Cushion not included. Size is 32x40cm.

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge (who you can see in the second photo with her son Jackson).

Wash at 30 degree with mild detergent to help to protect colour and our environment.

name: 'Cockatiel' cushion covers
description:
We love this vintage style birdy print it has a touch of the 30's-40's about it which is very pleasing. 

Patterned fabric on front with plain light green on back. 100% cotton with zip fastening (cushion not included).

50x50cm 

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge (who you can see in the second photo with her son Jackson).

Can be washed at 40 degree with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

name: Lucky eight cushion cover
description:
We love the rich colours and bold design of this fabric. Deep claret reds and blues in a figure of eight design perfect for cuddling up to on the sofa this winter. 

Covers are patterned fabric on front with plain back in deep claret on the back which can be seen in the extra photos below). 100% cotton with zip fastening (cushion not included).

Available in two sizes: 

Large: 50x50cm
Small: 30x30cm

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge (who you can see in the second photo with her son Jackson).

Can be washed at 40 degree with mild detergent to help to protect our environment.

name: Brown hen cushion cover
description:
SALE

We're always a suckers for a bird print - 100% cotton patterned fabric on front with in brown and cream with deep brown cotton on the back with zip fastening.

name: 'Wishing well' hemp and organic cotton canvas table runner
description:
This very special table runner is made from eco friendly hemp and organic cotton fabric in 'latte' on one side and brightest blue and red 100% cotton 'water well' hollandais wax on the other. 

Can be used either way round to dress and protect your table. 

Size: 230x36.5cm

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect bright colours and our environment.

name: Recycled paper braclets
description:
Handmade in Kampala by dear friend Sarah Namaganda from recycled materials - magazines, news papers and packaging that would otherwise add to the landfill problem in Bwaise.

Each piece is individual and unique, they are made of bright, colourful beads that are treated with varnish to protect them and threaded on to elastic.

Available in red, green or blue or buy a set of three (one of each colour) and save 50p 

Sarah shows you how she makes them in this short film 

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/N6mKzxRbhJE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

options.name: 3 recycled paper bracelets - red, green & blue

name: Recylcled paper necklace
description:
Handmade in Kampala by Rukia and Sarah from recycled materials - magazines, news papers and packaging that would otherwise add to the landfill problem in Bwaise.

Each piece is individual and unique, they are made of long strands (c160cms each) of bright, colourful beads that are treated with varnish to protect them - you can wear them long, wrap them or knot them.

One necklace is Â£8 

SPECIAL OFFER: buy three necklaces for Â£20 - saving Â£4!

Sarah shows you how she makes them in this short film 

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/N6mKzxRbhJE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

description:

Each one is unique and made from real African or 'Hollandais' wax fabric fabric. 

They are all handmade by us.

Three badges per pack - patterns and colours vary.

name: A herd of African animals
description:
Just like in real life the colours, sizes and shapes of our the animals vary slightly.

Treat someone special to a set of four animals  (Rhino, Giraffe, elephant and Zebra for a bargain Â£20 - or order them individually - see order option below).

(Rhino and Zebra approx. 8x5cm Giraffe approx. 5x16cm)

*Please note our animals are not kite mark approved so treat with caution with very young children. Theyâre wild animals from Africa but will happily adapt to life in the UK if you treat them well.

options.name: Set of three African animals (Giraffe, Zebra and Rhino)

name: 'Sarah and Delphine' handmade mummy and baby rag dolls
description:
SALE now Â£15!

This mother and baby are off to the market... 

Mum and baby are made from cotton with hand embroidered hair and faces in wool. The mom is 16.5" tall and her baby is 3" tall approx. Baby is removable and can be taken out of the carrier. 

Dolls have machine stitched bodies for tough seams but hair and clothing may contain small parts - and she is not fireproof!

Please hand wash only.

name: Large handmade Zebra
description:
Do you have a room in your home for a Zebra?

The colour or our zebra's are consistent but, just like in real life, the shapes and sizes of our animals vary.

Approx. 5x6"

*Please note our animals are not for very small children. The bodies are machine stitched for strength but their flowing manes and swishy tails are hand stitched with wool and may contain small parts

Theyâre wild animals from Africa but will happily adapt to life in the UK if you treat them well :)

name: 'Wishing well' cotton and eco bamboo fleece baby pram blanket
description:
LIght yet warm - one side this beautiful blanket is made from super soft and cuddly bamboo fleece and the other is a gorgeous super colourful 100% cotton hollandais (or 'African') wax.

Bamboo is a very soft, natural and ecological material, perfect to keep babies cosy.

Makes a great gift - let us know if yo'd like us to wrap it.

This blanket measures approximately 24" by 34" and can be machined washed on 30 degrees.

Â£29.00

Washed at 30 degrees to retain colour and softness of fabric and save the environment.

name: Chicken hand screen printed organic fairtrade baby t-shirt
description:
Our super cute chicken baby t-shirts are screen printed by hand using water based non-toxic ink.

This short sleeved t-shirt is made from soft and stretchy 100% certified organic unbleached cotton. T-shirts sized 3-18 months have poppers on shoulder for ease of dressing.

Can be washed at 40 degrees. 

Available in ages: 3-6, 6-12 and 12-18 months and 2-3, 3-4, 5-6 and 7-9 years.

description:

This short sleeved baby suit is made from soft and stretchy 100% certified organic unbleached fairtrade African cotton, with envelope shoulders and poppers for ease of dressing.

Can be washed at 40 degrees. Currently available for ages 3-6, 6-12 and 12-18 months. 

Hand printed for you by Steve Willard and Emma Scullion

name: Polka dress
description:
SUMMER SALE - now only Â£15

Available in ages 3, 5 and 7 years only

Super soft blue 100% cotton in an intricate ocean blue pattern with contrasting red dots. A ideal casual dress - it is cut wide so also makes a great long top worn over jeans and leggings.

Dress ties at shoulders.

Hand made for you by Salima Najjingo

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to be kind to bright colours and help protect our environment.

name: Umbrella shift dress
description:
SUMMER SALE - now only Â£12

Available in 5 years only.

A simple shift dress tailored from a fun blue and cream umbrella patterned fabric with two patch pockets on the front (essential for filling with your favorite things!).

This dress zips at the back and has a navy blue cotton lining. 

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge who you can see with her son Jackson in the second photo.

Washed at 30 degrees with mild detergent to help to protect bright colours and our environment.

name: Hen dress
description:
SUMMER SALE - now only Â£12

Available in 2, 3, 5 & 8 years only

100% cotton A-line dress that ties at the shoulders. 

Handmade for you by Salima Najjingo who you can see in the second photo.

Wash at 30 degrees with mild detergent to be kind to bright colours and save our environment.

name: Lucky eight shopper bag
description:
SALE now just Â£8 

Bright, colourful and 100% cotton shopping bag is strong, durable and fun!

Size: approx. 36x42cm

Handmade for you by Robina (who you can see in the second photo).

name: Dragonfly dress
description:
SUMMER SALE - now only Â£15

Available in 3, 4 and 7 years only

We were thrilled to find this fabric in the market in Kampala - the Large yellow and red dragonflies contrast against the deep royal blue background of this cool cotton summer dress.

The dress ties at the shoulders for easy of dressing...also looks fabulous worn over leggings.

Washed at 30 degree with mild detergent to be kind to bright colours and protect our environment.

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge who you can see with her son Jackson in the second photograph

name: Daisy shopper bag
description:
A bright, colourful and 100% cotton shopping bag. Strong, durable and fun.

Size: approx. 36x42cm

Handmade for you by Robina (who you can see in the second photo).

name: Flight shopper bag
description:
Bright, colourful and 100% cotton shopping bags. Strong, durable and very pretty!

Size: approx. 36x42cm

Handmade for you by Robina (who you can see in the second photo).

name: Peacock shopper bag
description:
Bright, colourful and 100% cotton shopping bag. Strong, durable and fun!

I had to give myself a good talking to let go of this fabric and have it made in to bags as it is one of my favorite patterns...but it was worth it they look great!

Size: approx. 36x42cm

Handmade for you by Robina (who you can see in the second photo).

name: Green cushion cover
description:
Add a splash of summer colour to your sofa or bed with these 100% cotton cushion covers.

Patterned front (as shown) with navy 100% cotton back and zipper (cushion not included).

Size: approx. 40x40cm

Handmade for you by Florence (who you can see in the second photo)

These are down to the last pair too!

name: Green vine quilted bag
description:
SALE now only Â£2

Our small quilted bags are ideal for protecting small cameras, mobile phones or used as a purse.

This fun 'green vine' fabric is 100% cotton with a plain lining and zip is washable too.

Size approx. 10x15cm

Handmade for you by Florence (who you can see in the second photo).

name: Diamond dress
description:
SUMMER SALE - now only Â£12

Available in size 3-6 months only

Handmade for you by Sarah Kabenge (who you can see in the second photo with her son Jackson).

We have designed these dresses to show off the selvedge of the fabric (because that what you do in Uganda!).

Button at the shoulders to make it easier to dress wriggling babies.

It is made from 100% cotton - machine washed at 30 to be kind to bright colours and our environment

name: Paisley dress
description:
SUMMER SALE - now only Â£12

Available in size 3-6 months only

This paisley dress is perfect for summer days or can be worn over plain baby grows and tights. 

Handmade for you by Sarah (who you can see in the second photo with her son Jackson). 

We have designed these dresses to show off the selvedge of the fabric (because that what you do in Uganda!). Buttons at shoulders to make it much easier to dress wriggling babies.

It is made from 100% cotton. Wash at 30 degrees to be kind to bright colours and save our energy

name: Add a donation to change the lives of children in the slums of Kampala
description:
A donation to awamu will help orphaned and vulnerable children like Tom (who you can see in the film below) in two of the poorest areas of Kampala. 

Tom was ecstatic when he was able to enrol in school for the first time earlier this year...

Â£5.56 could buy a school sweater for one child
Â£13.86 could buy a good pair of school shoes
Â£243  could cover the cost of skills training for one guardian
Â£42 could help us refurbish an old sewing machines
Â£139 could buy a new sewing machine
Â£66.67 could pay one year of school fees inc. text books and pens for one child
Â£22 could cover the cost of school fees for one term
Â£467 could cover school for one child for seven years
Â£975 could support one child through seven years of Primary Education

To read more about the children you are helping and the projects we are supporting please visit www.awamu.co.uk. 

THANK YOU.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/sBZ1xce0UFM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Awamu is a registered C.I.C no. 7818944
